abstract: Study published in The Archives of Surgery finds patients who undergo gastric bypass surgery also tend to lose weight, eat better and exercise more.
snippet: Family members of gastric bypass patients also tend to lose weight, eat better and exercise more, according to a new study.
lead_paragraph: Family members of gastric bypass patients also tend to lose weight, eat better and exercise more, according to a new study.

headline.main: Patterns: Gastric Bypass Surgery’s Ripple Effect
headline.print_headline: Patterns: Gastric Bypass Surgery’s Ripple Effect
headline.seo: Gastric Bypass Surgery’s Ripple Effect on Families
